title: Takeaways from Championship Weekend and QB Carousel
description:
Cole and Ryan are joined by The Ringer’s Kaelen Jones to recap Championship Weekend and briefly look ahead to the Super Bowl (2:25). Then they play matchmaker between quarterbacks who could be on the move and teams looking for a quarterback this offseason (26:25).

Hosts: Cole Wright and Ryan Shazier
Guest: Kaelen Jones 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
